description: When true, does not allow editing of a Skill Item Category.

Skill_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Skill_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Skill_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: A reference to a Skill Item Category, used for editing.

Skill_Item_Category_Data.description: The name of a Skill Item Category.
The ID of a Skill Item Category.
When true, the Skill Category is inactive.

Local_SkillObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Local_SkillObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Local_SkillObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Skill_Category_Skill_Item_Data.description: A reference to a maintained skill or Skills Cloud skill. You must enable Skills Cloud to upload Skills Cloud skills.
The name of the skill to assign to the Skill Category.

Skill_Item_Category_Data.description: Element container for Skill Item Data.

validation.validation: You must enable Skills Cloud to upload Skills Cloud skills.

Skill_Category_GroupObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Skill_Category_GroupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Skill_Category_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Skill_Item_Category_Group_Data.description: A reference to the Skill Category Group.
The name of the Skill Category Group to assign to the Skill Category.

Skill_Item_Category_Data.description: Element container for Skill Category Group Data.

description: Contains all the information about a Skill Item Category.

validation.validation: To create a new Skill Item Category, enter a name that isn’t the same as an existing Skill Item Category Name.

description: When true, the Skill Category is deleted.
